inn1.comm: back of a length, slanting in, flicked away to square leg
same ball, same shot, same fielder. Slightly fuller if anything
straighter one, beautifully bowled, remember his straight delivery is as good as an outswinger, beating Karthik who charges at him
back of a length, around off, punched away to cover
same ball, same shot again
swinging into the pads, misses out, the ball rolls off the pad
and bowls a loosener down the leg side
bigger wide this time, there is swing but it is way down the leg side
gets the line right, Ojha takes half a step forward and defends
swinging into the pads, clipped away for one
shorter, on the pads, worked for a single
beaten, between bat and pad, just came forward and hung his bat down the wrong line, and the posthumous swing made it tough for Chandimal to keep, conceding a bye
gets behind it this time to defend it back to the bowler
leaves this one alone outside off
big inswing again, beats him, and the ball rolls off the pad
and again, Karthik flicks an inswinger on the pads straight to square leg
same ball, and this time he gets the shot fine of square leg, getting a single
his best inswinger so far, headed - after the swing - to the top of off and middle stumps, Ojha can't do much more than defend
straighter one outside off, Ojha doesn't get drawn into a shot

Perfecto! Big inswinger, hits him in front of off, headed for middle, Ojha's bat is nowhere near it, and Kula has struck beautifully. Umpire Koertzen's slow finger of death comes up one of the last few times. Inswinger, outsinger, inswinger, elementary
angled across Karthik, who stands on his toes and punches it wide of mid-off
shorter, beats Karthik who looks to whip and is hit on the thigh pad
angled across him, and he gets into a nice shot, but finds extra cover
that's a Sehwag-like pull, short-arm, from outside off, through midwicket, all along the ground. Karthik finally getting a move on
fuller ball, around off, rolls off the inside half of his bat
angled across him, cut away, but seems cramped for room, and hence gets no power behind it
stays back in the crease and clips this off his pads to fine leg
almost, almost, inswinger, Karthik drawn in to a big drive, gets an inside edge into the pad
lovely shot, Kula tries the straighter one outside off, and Karthik punches it with an open face, square of the wicket, through the gap
full, outside off, no swing, hit straight to mid-off
which makes him bowl slightly shorter, and he is whipped away through midwicket for two
the big inswinger again, but Karthik is right behind it, covering the movement
angled across Kohli, who leaves it alone - he has been at the pitch for 2.1 overs but has faced only two deliveries
fuller, Kohli goes across and defends around his front pad
shorter, outside off, played to point
similar delivery, defended with an open face again
back of a length, angled across him, defended to cover
looks to whip it wristily from outside off, the ball goes to cover - thankfully for Kohli, along the ground. Second maiden of the innings
too far down the leg side, and he glances it fine and comes back for two before Mendis can put his slide in and get the ball back in
lovely shot, short of a length, gives him room, and he punches it through the covers, that's a shot he has played well today
fuller, Karthik comes forward and defends

inswinger again, beats him could, could be a chance of bat-pad but the keeper has lost the ball, and it bounces on the adjacent pitch. The reaction from fielders doesn't suggest there was bat involved. No great disappointment
beats him with the inswinger again, the ball rolls of the pad
comes forward to play this one, the ball goes off the inside half of the bat, to mid-on
angled into the hips, and Kohli is hit in the thighs
full outside off, Kohli comes forward and defends
short again, worked away from into front of middle stump, and they come back for two
poor delivery, gently angling into the pads, and Kohli flicks it away for four. Gifts these are
now wide outside off, and Kohli steers it away for one
short and wide again, cut away, and Jeewan Mendis makes a good save at short cover-point
full, shaping in towards off stump, defended back
this one doesn't come in, Kohli defends away from the body, but off the middle of the bat
back of a length, outside off, looks to whip it, but ends up playing it back to the bowler
inswinger again, manages to get the inside half of his bat as he looks to defend
stays back in the crease, waits for it to swing, and then helps it square on the on side
back of a length, moving in towards off stump, defended to mid-on
starts off with a short and wide delivery, but he has protection at sweeper-cover
loose shot, he looks to flay this from outside off, and ends up flaying thin air
played on the up, nice connection, but finds mid-on
nice shot again, shortish delivery, still plays it on the up, with a vertical bat, and straight of mid-on, all along the ground

legcutter does it, and Karthik has gone for a middling score after a good start once again. This legcutter is slow off the pitch and Karthik looks to play on the up again, the bat slices in his hand and he offers a simple return catch
short and wide, he throws his arms at it, and it is too wide even for his long arms
short and wide again, short-arm-cut this time, and he gets off the mark with four
inswigner down the leg side, Chandimal appeals for a catch, umpire thinks it flicked the pad
better line, around off, swinging in, defended to on
good shot, goooood shot, back of a length, outside off, and punches it on the up, through the covers
fuller ball, whipped away to deep square leg for one
inswinger into the pads, rolls off the pads
looks to force this through the off side, is cramped for room, and hits one-bounce to cover
starts off well, around off, straightening just a little, defended to cover
middle and leg with this carrom ball, defended to midwicket
flighted this time, pushed to long-on
too full, easily hit down the ground for one
short, around off, hit to sweeper-cover for one
beats him outside off, slight legbreak with the carrom ball, and Yusuf drives inside the line
full and wide, driven to extra cover
on the pads, worked away for an easy single
tries the bouncer, as every fast bowler does bowling to Yusuf, but it is down the leg side
and he tries another one, outside off, and Pathan - as he usually does - top-edges it, but this one lads safe over the keeper's head
goes for the full ball, way down the leg side, Chandimal does well again
short ball again, Pathan ducks under it
fuller, on the pads, and worked away into the on side
shortish, not too high, pulls it from outside off, in front of square, gets two
full carrom ball, defended back to him
slightly shorter, forced away into the off side
flighted, pushed down the ground, Mendis dives to his left to save a single
loopy googly, defended to midwicket
Perera dives full length from backward point to save four runs here. Top effort for a bulky bowler
fuller, driven powerfully but straight to mid-off
short and wide, Pathan is early into the shot and ends up hitting it back to the bowler
full and wide, and at gentle pace, asking Pathan to hit him and Pathan obliges by placing it between mid-off and extra cover
full and closer to the off stump, Yusuf swings again, and gets a thick inside edge for one
wide off off, forces it through the off side, wide of sweeper-cover, comes back for two
full and wide, throws his arms at it, gets a thick edge that lands just short of third man
bouncer again, 128ks, and he has no choice but to duck
Kohli looks to take a single off the fumble at mid-off, is sent back, and makes it just in time
worked off the pads, fine of fine leg, comes back for two
drives a carrom ball on the up, straight to mid-off
more confusion, this time it is Yusuf who wants a single off a defensive shot into the on side. Has to put in the dive to get back
Perera is superb again, this time diving full length from square leg to field this pull shot
driven wide of sweeper-cover, and he comes back for two more
goes for the cut shot, finds point
back of a length, around off, patted back to the bowler
same length, slight width, defended to short cover
looks to run this down, is too close to his body, and ends up playing it to point
finally finds a gap in the off side, gets a single
slower, fuller, whipped away off the pads
driven on the up, to mid-off but
looks to sweep, misses, gets a leg-bye
and Yusuf still backs away and slogs into the on side, lucky for him it falls short of deep midwicket
and that's where he cuts this one
full ball, driven down to long-on for one
googly, creates a short length by rocking back and pulls, but can't beat midwicket in the circle
gets a ball outside off, but can't get it through the off-side infield
slogs at this length ball, and the thick edge flies over the short third man
and he gets a poor delivery too, full toss outside off, and all he has to do is clear the infield on the off side, which he does with ease
lucky, is the bowler, short and wide, and Pathan's cut finds cover-point
slower short ball, doesn't rise at all, and Pathan pulls it nicely, square of deep square leg
full outside off, hit to long-off for one
angling down the leg side, Chandimal appeals for a catch, and Umpire Tiffin thinks it has come off the pad
into the pads again, worked away for one
looks to make room and get into sparsely populated off-side, but finds extra cover
creates a pulling length by rocking back, and pulls it wide of long-on for four
India are turning it on here. This time Kohli drives this between mid-off and extra cover. Another four
and tips and runs now to cap off a beneficial over
back of a length, pinches a single to midwicket
full, drilled straight to mid-off, along the ground
slower ball, too full, within his reach, Yusuf makes room and murders it over lid-off
maybe this is why, he digs it in, but it hardly gets up wait high, and Yusuf pulls it down to long-on for one
yorker, digs it out back to the bowler
full, on the pads, worked away to deep midwicket
short and wide, cut away to deep point
comes down the track, and kicks out a short delivery
short again, worked away for one
short, punched away, to extra cover
another wristy shot into the off side, but finds the straightish extra cover this time
pushed to long-on for one - only 39 off Powerplay, thanks to two overs from Mendis, which went for five runs
too short, easily pulled away for one
fuller, pitched outside leg, turning towards middle, beaten
too far down the leg side
comes down the track and hits this to long-on for one
flighted outside off, driven to long-off for one
flat, into the pads, helped away for a single
full, into the pads, finds midwicket with the wristy shot
shortish, turning in, steered away for one
too short, outside off, but hit to mid-off
flighted outside off this time, driven to long-on for one
ugly slog sweep, this is not the length to do it, and he is beaten, and somehow - Randiv doesn't know how - the ball bounces over the middle stump
flat topspinner, defends
another ugly slog sweep, and this time he connects - to his own demise. Gets too much under it and skies it to Perera at long-on
looks to pull but hurries him
pushed to long-on for one
full, Sharma drives the first ball he faces to long-off
short, stays back, and pushes it down to long-on
waits for this, plays it with soft hands, and takes a single to point
into the pads, fails to make connection
shortish, stays back and defends
another defensive shot towards cover, Rohit rightly sends Virat back
dances down the track and pushes it to long-on
short and wide, cut away for one
guided to deep point for one
pushed to long-on for another single
shimmies down the track to push it to long-off for one, ffifty up for Kohli
short ball, hit to sweeper-cover for one
overpitched, easily pushed to long-on for one, fifty up for Kohli according to the score board at the ground
into the pads, defended to midwicket
same line, and again he can't get it past midwicket
middle and leg this time, and pushed down to long-on for one
cut away to deep point for one
slight drift, Kohli presses forward and defends
works this from outside off, but not past a diving midwicket
goes straighter this time, to long-on for one
short outside off, gets a single
turning into the pads, can't get it past square leg
legbreak, on the leg-stump line, defended to on
comes down the track, pushes, can't get it past straight midwicket
gets a single this time, to long-on
comes down the track and with this single to long-on, Kohli moves to 1000 ODI runs - second-fast Indian to the mark, according to feedbackers
another single to long-on
driven nicely between two extra covers, one orthodox and one straightish, but still there is long-off to cut it off
worked around the corner for one
looks to work it into the on side, with the turn, but finds square leg
full outside off, drives this to long-on for one
short, hit to long-on for another single
tossed up outside off, driven to long-off for one
short outside off, pushed against the turn, to sweeper-cover for one
flighted on the pads, pushed down the ground for one
short, spinning away, crashed past extra cover for four. Breaks the monotony of singles down the ground
and again, pushes it down to long-off for one
hit back to the bowler
on the pads, helped away for one
flat delivery, hit back to the bowler
nice shot, comes down the track and chips it over extra cover
back to taking a single to long-off
flat delivery, hit back to the bowler
worked with the turn, into the on side
pushed down to long-on for one
turned into the pads, and helped away for another single
lovely fielding! Hit powerfully back at Mendis, who gets a hand to it, and then Kapugedara from long-on makes a full-length diving save
short, hit powerfully, but finds orthodox extra cover
fuller, finds the straight extra cover this time
driven to long-on for one
short ball, gets a single to sweeper-cover
drives inside-out, but straight to the orthodox extra cover
shortish, pushed down to long-off for one
short, turning in, pushes it to straight midwicket
fuller, gets it wide of midwicket this time
flighted outside off, gets a single to long-on
turning into the pads, can't get it past the straightish midwicket
wants a single to square leg but is rightly sent back
length ball on the pads, gets a single into the on side

finally the frustration of finding the fielders again and again has got to Kohli. Looks to clear long-off this time, but doesn't get any power in this shot and holes out, Jeewan Mendis taking a nice safe catch
looks to turn this down, and is surprised by diving save from point, but they make the single
defended off the back foot to short cover
steered away to third man for one
tries the bouncer outside off, Raina ducks even though it doesn't get up at all
sweeps, but straight to square leg
short outside off, helped away to short third
pushed into the off side for a single
looks to work into the on side, gets a leading edge, lands in front of the bowler
short, goes back, gets a isngle to sweeper-cover
dances down the track, goes against the spin, and finds the gap between mid-on and midwicket
punched on the up, but straight to point
short ball, pulled away nicely keeps it down and finds the gap between deep square and deep midwicket, moves to 1000 career runs in style
angled across him and steered away for one
played with an open face, but can't beat point
driven on the up, gets a single to sweeper-cover
slower bouncer, and he helps it to third man for one

sharp offbreak, through the gap, and hits the top of middle stump. In SRT style, he semi-squats, suggesting it stayed low, but the ball has hit the top of middle, he was just late in bringing the bat down
flighted outside off, turns away sharply, he lets it go
tospinner this time, manages to get the bat down in time, and hands on head this time
pushes forward to defend, inviting a topspinner to get him lbw
looks to cut this time, and he hits over the ball, missing the under edge by inches
plays with a vertical bat this time, and is beaten by the offbreak. Wicket-maiden for Randiv
played with an open face, can't beat point
driven on the up, and uppishly, but wide of extra cover
another extravagant drive through the off side, gets two to wide of deep point
and again, Thushara keeps feeding him the length, and he keeps driving on the up, this time only for a single
short, and flashes at it away from the body, no feet movement, and the edge falls way short of Samaraweera at wide slip, he gets a single too off the deflection off Sam's body
looks to run this down to third man, gets a bottom edge to fine leg
goes back into the crease, and punches it through the off side for one
extra-cover drive, but Kapuagedera is superb in diving to his wrong side and preventing any runs
into the pads, worked around the corner
comes down the track, is beaten in the flight, and so just defends at it
looks to cut and is beaten by one that stays low
flighted around off, played with an open face for one
short ball, pulled away for a single to deep midwicket
quick delivery, Jadeja drops and runs to cover
googly, plays it with an open face, takes a single
flighted outside off, defended off the front foot
strange! No appeal. Carrom ball, hits him in front of middle and leg. That would have made for a very very good shout
flighted around off, lofted over Mendis, gets two
Kapu you beauty! Rubbish delivery, short and wide, and Raina hits it powerfully straight off extra cover, but Kapugedara flies to his lift, goalkeeper-style, and pouches it. Captain gets captain
turning in, helped away with the spin for a single
short ball, pushed down to long-on for another single
stays back, looking to work it to the on side, but is hurried into the shot, and ends up hitting it back to Dilshan
into the pas, hit straight to square leg
and again finds a fielder, midwicket this time
turns it from outside off, to midwicket for one
full, into the pads, finds straight midwicket
slightly shorter, hit back to the bowler
googly, worked with the spin for one
flighted outside off, guides it past point for one
chips down the track, gets to the pitch of the ball, and takes a single to long-on
long hop, Ashwin hits it straight to square leg, along the ground
another short ball, pushes it for one this time
helped away to short fine for one
flighted around off, hit back to the bowler
shorter, looks for a single to long-off, can't get it wide of Dilshan
into the pads, worked away for one
full and straight, pushed down to long-on for one
right out of the screws, gentle tossed-up delivery, and Jadeja lofts it over long-on. Badly needed by India
flatter, shorter, worked away for one to square leg
angled in as he looks to make room, gets a single to deep midwicket
misses a quick delivery on the pads, wants the leg-bye, but is sent back because it is very close to square leg
looks to force this into the off side, can't beat cover
helps this from outside off to short fine for one
comes forward, defends this into the off side, and comes through for one
comes down the track, pushes it to long-on for one
charges at him, hits powerfully, one bounce to long-on, and trips over while taking the single
late-cut, sees a straighter one and opens the face, but gets only a single to short third
yorker, can't do much with it, and Randiv finishes 10 overs for 38 runs and two wickets
length ball outside off, takes a single to cover
offbreak, Jadeja plays across the line, is beaten, but is saved perhaps by its pitching outside the line
makes room, but finds midwicket with the hit
this time he doesn't bother about keeping it down and makes room and goes for the lofted shot, and clears long-on not by much
another heave-ho, and this time the lofted shot lands smack between long-on and deep midwicket, India badly need these runs
gets inside the line and flicks it over short fine, but they take only a single by the time the deep square gets around and gets the ball back
length ball, plays a nothing shot to extra cover
slower ball, and he gives it another heave-ho, and wide of long-on is his favourite area. Gets another four
Ashwin is giving India something to bowl at, this time walks across the stumps and scoops a length ball over short fine
yorker outside off, gets a single to point
another yorker outside off, takes a risky single to point, but Samaraweera misses the direct-hit
makes room, gets a yorker, which he digs out for a single towards point
shuffles across again, and lofts this length ball square into the on side, and it bounces short of the deep square leg
high full toss, just outside off, not high enough to be called full toss, they steal a bye

another high full toss, called no-ball this time as Jadeja manages to lob it towards midwicket. Ashwin wants the single but Jadeja is late to start, and Dilshan hits the only stump visible to him while running in from midwicket
backs away, then shuffles way across, and scoops this from outside off, over short fine. Top shot

what a catch! Length ball, drilled back straight down the wicket, and Thushara sticks his left hand to it, and takes it on the second attempt. Just to show how superb a catch it is, Umpire Koertzen is looking towards the straight boundary and wondering where the ball is. No reaction from Thushara either after completing this stunner
and Dinda walks out, slower ball, and he heaves it over towards long-on, completely deceived by it. Kapugedara takes another catch, and Thushara is on hat-trick
slower ball again, Pankaj manages to keep it down, just to the right of Thushara, and also steals a single to retain strike
length ball, hit powerfully to long-off for one
full outside off, guided to third man for a single
slower ball, too short, hit into the on side for one
low full toss outside off, Ojha gets a crucial outside edge that travels fine for four
full outside off, Ojha swings inside the line and is beaten
slower ball, beats him, but Pankaj Singh shows the presence of the mind to steal a bye

inn2.comm: beats him outside off first up, slight seam movement away from the hanging bat
follows it up with a wide down the leg side
length ball, slight shape into the pads, played to mid-on
swing in again, Tharanga is equal to it, defending it to mid-on
same area, shaping in towards his leg stump, and again played to mid-on
this is angled away, and takes his edge, but soft hands mean it hardly flies away. Anyway it goes between first slip and a very wide slip
length ball, middle and leg, defended
length ball, no swing pushed to mid-off
short, into the pads, fails to make contact but takes a leg-bye
short, pulls from outside off, and ends up hitting it straight down the ground, straight of mid-on, all along the ground, and the timing is good enough
full and wide, throws his bat at it, one bounce to point, on a half-volley in fact
shortish, punched so hard into the adjacent wicket that it almost bounces over short cover-point, who jumps and manages to get a hand to it
length ball on the pads, played softly to mid-on
short, wide, cut away, thanks for coming
short, wide again, and this time he goes over the cover field. Thanks for coming again
slightly fuller, slightly closer, Dilshan punches, this time he finds cover-point
off-stump line this time, Dilshan defends
again cramps him up, and again Dilshan pats it back to the bowler
kicks at him, Dilshan does well to drop his bottom hand, and manages to get is fine of gully, along the ground again
length ball, outside off, Dilshan swings and misses. No feet
slight movement away, beats him outside off as Dilshan looks to cut
and again he is beaten on the cut shot
length ball outside off, and carved over point, gets two
back of a length, around off, defended
back of a length, around off, no room, Dilshan defends
beautifully bowled, around off, seaming away slightly, beating Tharanga
lovely cover-drive this time, too full and Tharanga meets with an open face, past the diving extra cover
back of a length, around off, defended
shortish, on the pads, can't beat square leg
angling across, guided down to third man for one
full into the pads, runs as soon as he realises he hasn't hit it hard enough towards mid-on
full ball, outside off, in the slot, Dilshan stands tall and murders it past mid-off
Dilshan gets too excited, and looks to clear mid-on. The ball was there in his striking reach, but took the inside half of his bat and Yusuf Pathan at mid-on took a nice overhead catch
beaten outside off as he looks to drive it on the up
gets behind it this time and defends
into the pads, worked away for one
short and wide, cut one bounce to short point
short and wide, but moves in and gets an inside edge from him, which misses the leg stump somehow
length ball, pretty straight, hit back to the bowler
back of a length, on the pads, played with soft hands
steers this from middle and off, to third man
back of a length, slightly more confident from Chandimal, but the punch finds cover
on the up again, to mid-off this time
length ball wide outside off, and he drives it over and wide of mid-off
punched on the up, along the ground, to mid-off
short and wide, aborts the pull because it is too wide, and takes a single to short third man
yorker, digs it out
length ball, driven on the up, to extra cover
into the pads, violently whipped away to deep square
short, flat, played to short midwicket
turning into the pads, played to square leg
dances down the track, plays a full toss with an open face, through covers for two
and therefore Chandimal makes room again and places it through covers for two
no room this time and he plays it back to the bowler
turning into the pads, played to midwicket
nicely steered to third man for one
shot! Walks down the track and lofts a length ball over mid-on. Simple, effective
short and wide, misses out on the cut. No feet, hence swung away from the body
this time gets close to the short and wide delivery, cuts it into the adjacent pitch, and it bounces over short cover-point
fuller, into the pads, worked away for an easy single
length ball outside off, slight movement in towards him, and he is beaten as he plays outside the line of it
back of a length, hit back to the bowler
backs away and hits this to long-on for one
short and wide, spinning away, and cut away for four. No fuss
fuller, Tharanga presses forward and defends
comes way forward to defend again, there is slight extra bounce
this time he creates this short length by rocking way back and cuts it between backward point and cover-point. Top shot
Welcome Ojha to the bowling crease! No respect here, dances down the track, opens up his swing by getting a bit square on and then lofts him over cow corner
smart batting, sits back, expecting a flat delivery, and hits it to long-off for one
looks to cut, is beaten expecting spin but the ball goes straight on
stretches forward to defend this looped delivery
cuts this one all right, but can't beat point
into the pads, pushed back to the bowler
plays in front of his pad, helping this to fine leg for one
looks to drive this one, but it is too close to him and he hits it back to the bowler
cuts again but in front of square, as he usually does, and doesn't find the gap
stretches fully forward to pat this back to the bowler
defends with an open face towards point
manges to cut square this time, but still can't beat point
flighted around off, defended
stays on the crease and defends
Ojha and Koertzen are bemused as Karthik refuses to give up this appeal for lbw, clearly going down the leg side. Easy DK, easy
cuts this one, but one bounce to point
pushes this down to long-off for one
beautiful shot! Oof lovely, languidly he dances down the track, languidly he meets it, lofting it over long-off. No power, no heave, just lovely clean extension of the arms. And it is on the roof
and one more six, more diminutive, more powerful too, comes down the track and gives it his all, clearing long-off with a flat six
defended back to the bowler
turning into him, helped away for a single
looks to cut from in front of stumps, hits it to point - patting a burning dog, it is
against the run of play, edges this, just hangs his bat in a nothing shot, and the fullish delivery turns away taking the edge low towards slip where Kohli takes a smart catch
shortish delivery, turning in, plays with the spin but finds square leg
flighted around the leg-stump line, defended
sharp turn, beats him outside off
looks to cut, too full for the shot, and the bottom edge goes to slip on the bounce
comes down the track this time to take a single to long-off
presses forward to defend
big appeal for lbw, but he is hit outside the line of off
flat outside off and punched away for one
back of a length, around off, patted back to the bowler
played with the spin, for a single to wide of midwicket
comes down the track and even though he is not the pitch of the ball, he manages to push it down for one to long-on
shot! Bravo shot! comes down the track, right to the pitch of it, and flicks it over midwicket
looks to come down the track, sees a flat ball, stays on the crease and defends
six more, Chandimal is playing superbly against the spinners. Dances down the track again, opens up the leg side by opening up slightly and then lofts him over wide long-on
flat delivery, stays on the crease and defends
outside off, and punched away nicely, wide of sweeper-cover
flat, on the stumps, hit to straightish extra cover
comes forward and defends it towards the same fielder
into the pads, played to midwicket
worked around the corner for one
flat, turning into the pads, hits it to midwicket
pushed down to long-on for one
comes forward and dabs it back to the bowler
runs this down to deep point for another single
pushed to wide of cover for a single
comes forward to defend this one
cut from in front of off stump, to short extra cover
looks to hit this down the ground, can't get it wide enough of Jadeja
flighted delivery, hit back to the bowler
punched off the back foot, to straightish extra cover
short ball, pushed down the ground for one
turning in, and they steal a single to square leg
short again, and single to long-on again
flat delivery, hit back to the bowler

Chandimal is a little dynamo! What shot selection. Every time he has come down the track, he has connected well. This time he jumps at the bowler, gets slightly inside the line and lofts him with the spin and over midwicket
follows it up with a forward-defensive from the copy book
flat, around off, hit back to the bowler
off and middle and he stands tall to pat it
guides this to wide of cover for one
fired into the pads, played to midwicket
fired into the pads, defended back to the bowler
cuts this time, even though it is not short enough he uses the pace of the bowler well
length ball, around off, pushed to cover
punched to sweeper-cover for one
full, nearly a yorker, played back to the bowler
overpitched again, hit inside out, but not past extra cover
the obvious slower ball, and he cuts it to third man for one
yorker, around off, dug out
hit powerfully but Raina makes a diving save at extra cover
too short, and he rocks back and pulls it through midwicket for four more
dances down the track and drives inside-out, past extra cover and Ashwin makes a diving save at wide long-off
worked around the corner for one
comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
pulled away for four between deep midwicket and deep square leg
length ball outside off, looks to drive, feet don't move, is beaten
driven on the up, Raina gets a hand on it diving from extra cover
punched square of the wicket, gets a single
slower ball, no trouble as he guides it wide of cover for one
short, pushed to long-on for one
pushed down to long-off for one
fired down the leg side, kisses the pad on the way and Dinda puts in a dive at the fine-leg boundary
fired into the pads, defended back to the bowler
comes down the track, is yorked and hits to extra cover
driven inside-out, square of sweeper-cover
fired into the pads again, but he fails to miss square leg
gets a single wide of cover for one
flat ball, on the stumps, defended
lapped away from middle and leg for one
pushed to long-off for an easy single
this ball is like life itself - too short. Chandimal has lots of time to go back and pull it over midwicket
flat outside off, punched away to sweeper-cover for one
cut to sweeper-cover for a single
shimmies down the track and defends a length ball
too full, driven to long-off for one
full and flat again, driven inside out to sweeper-cover
fired into the pads, played to square leg
is yorked as he looks to come down the track, hits it towards extra cover
takes a single to wide of cover
driven on the up, but straight to mid-off
into the pads, clipped away wide of deep square, comes back for two
this one holds its line outside off, beating his attempt at a drive on the up
lovely shot, comes down the track as if to a spinner, then chips him over extra cover. No power, just the flow and the touch
angled into the pads, takes a single to square leg
pushed to long-off for one
charges at him and hits him powerfully straight past him, and comes back for two
flat and straight and full, patted back to him
full and flat again, wide of off, and hence pushed to sweeper-cover for one
into the pads, and helped away for an easy single
superb shot, charges at him, gets right to the pitch and lofts him back over his head. Are Sri Lanka going for the bonus point by any chance?
takes a step down the pitch and defends because he is not quite to the pitch of the ball
presses forward and defends again
shorter, flatter, he sends it back where it came from - to the bowler
swept away from leg-stump line
cuts this one - not too short at all - but he is very confident by now and is creating his own length
pushed down to long-off for another single
full, driven into the on side but straight to midwicket
flighted outside off, drives it to long-off for one
single to long-on now, they are milking it
long-off, single
looks to cut this, too full again, and is beaten

another six from Chandimal, but his least convincing of all, because the bat face opens in his hand as he looks to go straight over Pathan's head, and the ball goes towards long-off, and just manages to clear him
flat, around off, makes a diving save, they still take a single
flighted outside off, played to point
into the pads, worked around the corner, gets into his 90s
shortish, turns away, gets the toe end of the bat, back to the bowler
dropped by Karthik, he produces an edge with this offbreak as Kapugedara looks to defend, but it hits the edge of Karthik's glove and goes for a single
this is what Chandimal needs to watch out for. Looks to cut an arm ball that is too full. Is beaten, and is lucky that his off stump is still standing
back of a length, flat, easy single to long-on
floated outside off, Chandimal plays away from the body, towards point
gives him the charge, Yusuf fires it in short, gets an inside edge onto the pad, which lands safe. Slightly unsettled Chandimal looks
yes, another risky shot, cuts another delivery that is too full, and the edge just about clears backward point
this is better, gets in line and guides it wide of cover for one
into the pads, turned away to square leg
flat and full, defended back to the bowler
pats another full delivery back to the bowler
shorter, wider, pushed to cover
90s? what 90s? still dances down the track, and drives inside out, to sweeper-cover
so does Kapu, to long-off for another single
risky, risky, risk,y charges at him too early, Ojha slows it down, Chandi is not to the pitch of the ball, but aborts the aggressive shot and defends it back
fired into the pads, misses out, and is hit on the pad
shimmies down the track, looking for a single to long-on, can't get it wide enough of Jadeja
full and fast, defended
this time he manages to push it to long-on for one

that's 100! Nerves were showing on Chandimal's batting and he played another unconvincing shot - rare as they have been in this top knock. Got too close to the pitch and hit in the air towards long-off. Ashwin didn't cut the angle, and ran at right angles and let the ball fall in front of him. What's more, it bounced over his body for four. Chandimal removes the helmet and celebrates. Well played really, except for that last shot
comes forward and defends this one
again he pats it back to the bowler
he has holed out at wide long-off. The intention was to go over extra cover, but the ball didn't quite comes on and he ended up hitting a lot straighter than he wanted
into the pads again, worked away to fine leg for one
stands on the crease to defend this delivery, turning in from outside off
top shot, good fielding. Chandimal lofts this straight over the bowler's head, and Kohli is swift in coming from long-off and keeps them down to one
flighted outside off, new batsman gets an easy single to long-off - poor captaincy
flat and short, pulled away, on the bounce to midwicket
charges at him and drives this low full toss past point, and comes back for two
smeared into the pads again, and he paddles it fine, fine enough to come back for two
and another easy single to long-off
into the pads, hit straight to midwicket
cut against the turn, past backward point
all the way forward to defend this flighted delivery
premeditates the sweep, connects well, gets a single
loose shot, looks to loft over long-on, gets a thick edge that clears the cover ring and falls short of sweeper-cover
short, and pulled away to deep midwicket for one
sweeps, and is beaten, and hit in the pad
runs this down from in front of stumps, can't get it fine of short third
short, and pulled away for a single
plays with soft hands towards midwicket, and steals a single
unwieldy slog sweep from outside off, and gets a thick edge that flies over short third man
presses forward to defend this fullish delivery
angled into the pads, can't beat midwicket
fails to miss the midwicket fielder again
chips down the track and pushes him down to long-on for one
runs this down from in front of off stump, and Dinda makes a diving save at short third. Can't fault Dinda on the commitment scale
and finds the midwicket fielder again

carrom ball does it! beautifully bowled. Chandimal comes down the track, knows he is beaten in the flight as this is short, but he looks to defend and plays for an off break. However, this one turns away and beats him all ends up, setting up an easy stumping
flat outside off, too short, and Mendis waits for it and uses all of Pathan's pace to squeeze it past backward point. Smart batting
looks to sweep this from way outside the off stump, and is beaten. Ojha whips the bails off, they go the third umpire but he is back in
short again, and cut away in front of square for one
gets all the way forward and then paddles this from way outside off, and very fine. Pragyan Ojha puts in a dive at the fine-leg boundary
presses forward, defends this gentle offbreak
this one goes with the arm, gets the inside edge as he defends, and they scamper through for one
carrom ball, Sam adjusts really well, playing it with soft hands, keeping it down, and takes a single to short third
into the pads, worked away for an easy single
spinning into the pads, and helped around the corner
flighted outside off, defended

lovely shot, presses forward, sees a flat delivery, goes back and opens the face at the last moment. Pathan runs after it, and then makes a tumbling save, hurts himself too, but keeps them down to three
flat, on the pads, helped away for a single
bad bounce from the practice pitch at point for Yusuf Pathan, and they get a single
reverse-paddle, hits straight to short third, and is correctly sent back
down the leg side, and worked away for one
punches this one on the up, but straight to extra cover
full, into the pads, helped away for one
short, cut away powerfully in front of square, and Raina makes a diving save at extra cover
jumps out of his crease, is nowhere near the ball, and hence defends it and runs through
full, into the pads, gets a single to short fine
arm ball, he is stuck on the crease as he defends
cuts this from in front of stumps, finds points
full, on the pads, hit to long-on for one
mis-hit as he is hurried into this as he jumps down the track, and it falls just short of a charging-in Vijay from long-off
shot! goes across on a knee, and sweeps this quick delivery over short fine leg
they steal a single to short third despite a direct hit from Ashwin
fired across him, he opens the face of the bat but but the ball goes straight to short third
length ball on the pads, worked past midwicket
charges at him even before he bowls, Dinda bowls short, and he pulls it for one
looking to scoop it, but it is too wide of off, looks to open the face on it but hits straight to point
lovely shot, anticipates a yorker, makes room, gets an overpitched delivery, and drives it square, over point and square of third man
looks for the shot over short fine again, gets a slower ball, which he works much squarer for one
yorker, on leg stump, works it into the on side for one
another drive square of the wicket, this time the point fielder gets a hand to it
high full toss, edged away to third man - called no-ball for height
slower ball, worked into the on side for one
back of a length, hit straight to midwicket
offcutter, worked away off the pads for one
short, over the stumps, makes room and upper-cuts it over point, within one hit of the final
full ball, hit to midwicket straight
makes room and drives, but can't beat extra cover
length ball, worked away into the leg side, they run two but it is called one short

that's it, short ball, pulled away for four, and SL join Zimbabwe in the final. Well done, both of them, and India, as a reader said, are Out of Africa. Well not quite, they have to wait for this to finish and then play two T20s against Zimbabwe, regarding which Praveen Kumar writes in, "T20 should be interesting battle between India and Zimbabwe. Who knows INDIA can shock them with a win afterall its a T20.."
